transcript:
Customer: Hello ha ji very good afternoon.
Executive: Ha boliye.
Customer: Acha sir mai IndiaMART ke office se baat kar rahi hu lead manager Priyanka.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Mai aap se ye discuss kar rahi thi ki pehle jaise aapke paas samne se calls bhi nahi aate the aapko is November month me aapke paas call bhi aaya hai samne se do to us pe kya response aa raha hai.
Customer: [inaudible] aaya kaha aaya nahi aaya mere paas to call kaha aaya hai mam mere paas to mai keh raha hu nahi aaya mere paas kaha aaya call.
Executive: Sir lead manager lead manager me jaaiye waha pe call section me jaakar agar aap check karoge to aap dekhiye aapko UP east se call aaya tha first of November ko aapne baat bhi kari ek tarikh ko.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aaya mere paas first November ko kaha aaya aaj aaj kitna hai aaj teen tarikh hai aaj kitna tarikh ko bata rahe ho sab.
Executive: Ek tarikh ko ek tarikh ko.
Customer: Nahi nahi aaya ek tarikh ko call kaha dikha raha hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar lead manager me jaaiye aap ek baar lead manager me jaaiye.
Customer: Ha lead manager me hi hu mai ek to ye supportidas upar ka Hamirpur Hamirpur ka hai Hapur Hapur Hapur ka hai Hapur ka maa saraswati is ganit se ye Kanpur ka hai ye ye to alag chahiye isi ki keh rahe hai Kanpur ka aaya ye to call ha aaya aaya mere paas isse maine baat ki hai to yahi ka hai koi ye pata nahi ye location kaise galat dikha raha hai ye to yahi Ramgarh ka hai.
Customer: Mai aapke samne call laga ke dikha deta hu.
Customer: Ya abhi ya to Sharma bhi naam nahi hai iska Ankur Sharma naam hai aur ye yaha bhi Sharma Kanpur Uttar Pradesh se dikha raha hai ye hai aur ye jab ki nikla Ankur Sharma yahi ka hai ye Ramgarh ka.
Executive: Acha matlab aapke hi location ka hai but location change karke call kar raha hai ye keh rahe hai aap.
Customer: Ha mai aapke samne aapko deta hu number aap karke dekh lo.
Executive: Sir hame authority nahi hoti aise kisi bhi buyer ko call karne ki.
Customer: Nahi nahi mai aapke samne aapko laga ke dikhata hu call agar aap jhoot jaan rahe ho to ye to Ramgarh ka hi hai bola mai to khud murti banata hu murtikar mai to dekh raha tha kis profile hai ye bhai aise kyu dekh raha hai humne to kabhi dekha hi nahi aapka.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha man ki maine to kabhi dekha hi nahi aapki teen minute plus baat hui thi na to isliye maine aapko jaake puchungi.
Executive: Ha to teen minute nahi thi tab aise ho gaya na ki maine bola na usko fir aap mere se call kaise kar diya mere ko ek baat bata jab tum murti ka kaam kar rahe ho to is cheez se kya matlab hai to call kar raha hai to bola mai to dekh raha tha kis ka profile hai aap kaha se baat kar rahe hai man ki mai crystal aur in se Ashok Sharma baat kar raha hu Deepak marble murtiya ka owner bhai ye kya tarika hai man ki mai to hum to kisi ko karte hi nahi call hum to humne bhi kar rakha hai online bhi kar rakha hai offline bhi kar rakha hai apna dhandha are apne customer se matlab rakho na.
Executive: Samajh gayi mai koi nahi sir meri thik hai wo hum dekh rahe hai baki aap aise calls aate hai to hash one ya hash two press kar diya kariye.
Customer: Ye dekho suno ek aur aaya hai ek aur batata hu mai wo 31 October ko aaya tha shayad kya naam tha pata nahi baba.
Customer: Ruko ek minute Ravidas ji ki murti photo bhi dal rakhe hai ha agla bolta hai ye number kaha se aa gaya mera aapke paas bhai mere aapne requirement dala tab mere paas aaya ye to bol raha hai aisa kaise maine dala hi nahi hai kahi to mai dekhta hu hai shayad 31 ya 30 tarikh ka hai wo.
Executive: Acha.
Customer: Ha ye ha ye mil gaya ye ye baba ke naam se hai baba baba Haryana Punjab Haryana Punjab ye dono jile ka location dal rakha hai isme isme brand dal rakha hai 67555 Indore.
Customer: [inaudible] ye ye mere paas call aaya ye aur ye jab maine uthaya to maine baat ki.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To maine ha to maine bola inko to wo bhi aise bola mere se ki mai to yaha dekh raha tha call karke kaun bolta hai are kaun bolta hai bhai mai bol raha hu apni shop se kaun bolega phir rashtrapati bolega kya dekh bhai.
Customer: [inaudible] ab batao ha aisa nahi hai ye call bhi mai to ye very sorry sir aapne aisa face kiya suno suno mai aapke pair padta hu haath jodta hu aapke aage mere paas aisa call mat aane diya karo bhai isko hata do kya matlab hai mai faltu ka time jata hai mera call mai kisi ka uthata hu aur baat karta hu ye faltu ke log call karte hai to meri haath jod ke vinti hai mujhe call aaye chahe mat aaye mujhe nahi chahiye call.
Executive: Samajh gayi mai.
Customer: Mai dukhi hu is cheez se man me jo call kar diya aap bataiye agar aapka catalog dekh ke koi call aapko samne se kar raha to usme hum kya kar sakte hai aapko agar wo call aapke paas.
Customer: Band kar do suno band kar do ye jo call aata hai mat dikhao mera catalog kisi ko mujhe nahi chahiye bhai mujhe kyu faltu ka pareshan karenge log matlab kya matlab hai.
Executive: Samajh gayi mai aapki baat koi baat nahi but meri aapse ek request hai jab bhi aap koi buyleads uthate ho to aap jyadatar ye dekha karo client mobile email business name business address sab par active hai ya nahi active hai waise leads ko pick karoge to waha pe aapke maturity ke aur business business ke chances jyada hote hai sir.
Customer: Matlab aap se wahi request hai jaise ki jab aap koi lead consume karte ho to usse pehle aap waha pe jaake check karte ho na ki client is active on mobile email business name business address and everything to waha par aap ek cheez ye notice kiya karo if a client is active over the email business name business address and everything then aap please aap consume ki nahi wo to same jo same region is wala hai uske paas to mai kyu karunga call mai to nahi karta jab lead consume karta hu to dekhta hu usme location kaha ka hai kya location ka hai ye aur kis cheez ka ye sab karte hai location bhai Rajasthan me to hum kisi ko karte hi nahi acha aur jaha hame pata hai ki waha achcha khaasa business hai Ahmedabad Ahmedabad ka hum nahi karte bahut kam chance hote hai kyuki Ahmedabad me already bahut sari shop hai murtikaro ki matlab murti selling ka kaam karte hai wo yaha se le jaate hai bana banaya phir waha bechte hai to isliye baki call ka ye hai call ka maine bata diya ki call mere paas aaye na mai mere ko pasand nahi hai call mat aaye mere paas mai to ye chahta hu okay call aane se dikkat hai ji man lo inko kare aur ye god ye god idol aur swasti statue in dono ka aap lead consume kar rahe ho god idol aur swasti statue ek baar buylead preference me jaake inko remove kar dijiye waha se.
Customer: Ab mam ye isme likha hai makrana marble ki statue jaise ye aaya hai na ab isme likha idol ab idol to bhai chalo usne upar likh diya marble ha marble makrana marble to makrana marble ka idol bhi bol deta hai koi statue bol deta hai koi murti to isliye consume kar liya.
Customer: Ab wo wo alag hi cheez batane laga waha jab consume kar liya na to wo to bola ha crystal kya crystal kya bola tha uska kaha ye usko maine crystal ka nahi hai bhai apne paas to marble ka kaam hai marble ka banwa sakte ho aap agar aapke paas photo hai to photo dekh ke banwa sakte ho aise usko samjhaya to nahi nahi mere ko wo mahnga padega mere ko kam budget me chahiye to kam budget me wo kam quality marble kuch aisa bataya wo yahi iska response tha.
Executive: Meri aapse bas itni si request hai please aap services ko use kariye koi dikkat pareshani aati hai to aapke phone manager hai unko connect kariyega.
Customer: Mam jab lead aati hai jab consume karenge jab lead matlab mahine me do aati hai to ab usme kya karenge marble se related ab batao kaha se kaise niklegi jab 10 aaye to 10 me se ek aath to matlab nikal hi aati hai customer lekin jab hai nahi to kaha se.
Executive: Nahi aapki product line me bahut competition bhi hai sir agar mai baat karu.
Customer: To baad me to kya bataye usme kya jante hai baki aap aap please aapke paas abhi ek mail aayega please aap us pe positive response dijiyega request meri ye hogi koi dikkat pareshani aati hai please aap log positive response ka kaam hai kisi ko maine kabhi kiya hi nahi kisi ke liye ek cheez aur ek cheez aur discuss karungi ki jaise aapke 124 product hai unka score low hai kya hum inka score badha sakte hai wo to mai wo mai badha dunga ha badha dunga please badha lijiye kyuki aapko overall overall catalog ka jo score aa raha hai wo 57% hai agar ye 80% ho jayega to kuch aur changes bhi aa jayenge thode bahut.
Customer: Acha acha to mam aap hai na ek to ye request aur hai ki mere paas call to aaye mat aaye mujhe jarurat nahi call ki call aane se mere ko dikkat hoti hai kya batau mai okay okay sir wo matlab baat nahi tarike se kya call hai matlab customer hai to wo tarike se baat kare to koi baat bane wo jab tarike se baat nahi karta dimag kharab karne wali baat hai samne wala bol raha hai kya kare.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Kai log to itne badtameez hote hai kya batau jab unko call matlab ye aati hai na jab unko call karte hai bolte hai ye number kaha se aa gaya mere ko ye batao ab yaha se mai nikalunga kaise are bhai hum ye batane ke liye to baithe hai thik hai hamara bhi apna kaam hai apni koi jeevan zindagi hai lekin nahi logo ko samajh me nahi baithta okay chalo thik hai ha ji sir thik hai thank you so much sir please aap mail pe positive response dijiyega thik hai ha ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving unwanted calls.

- Wants to remove catalog to avoid unwanted calls.

- Low catalog score.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested pressing hash one or two.

- Executive suggested checking client activity before consuming leads.

- Executive offered to increase the catalog score.

- Executive suggested removing God idol and swasti statue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a mail for positive response.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, spam calls, score
